entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with GIF Image on iOS – Transparent GIF Background Displays as White #28714
  • Specifying x:Name of SolidColorBrush in ContentPage.Resources causes System.NullReferenceException #28711

Closed

  • [Windows, 9.0 SR5] Splash screen icons are randomly not copied into the output directory #28712
  • sai #28710

PullRequests

Created

  • [IOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #28713
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-flyout

Merged

  • Fix up net10 TODOs in PropertyMapper #28630
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Catalyst] Fixed the CanMixGroups Set to False Still Allows Reordering Between Groups in CollectionView #28623
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Label with a fixed WidthRequest has wrong height in Grid #26648
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, layout-grid
  • [iOS] Inherit UIContainerView from MauiView #26576
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • [Android] Set SetClipChildren to false in ViewCellContainer #26524
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] ScrollView - Setting SetClipChildren to false #26475
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] Use a GeneralWrapperView for a Flyout View #26461
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Image is not loading in RadioButton - fix #28254
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #26456
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using sw… #28694
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Account for safeArea when re-positioning a footer #26416
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Android] BackgroundColor for GraphicsView #26320
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    area-xaml, area-core-hosting, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Provisioning: Only install specific Android API levels if requested #28650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
